# shadowPath

**Instance Property**

The path to use for drawing the preview’s shadow.

## Declaration

```swift
@NSCopying @MainActor var shadowPath: UIBezierPath? { get set }
```

## Discussion

If `nil`, the system uses the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIPreviewParameters/visiblePath] to draw the shadow.

## Configuring the preview attributes

- **backgroundColor**: The background color to display behind the preview.
- **visiblePath**: The portion of the view to show in the preview.
